name: Jira Create Issue Test
description: Test case for creating a new Jira issue using jira_create_issue tool

parts.text:
Create a new Jira issue with the following details:
- Project: WOB
- Summary: Test issue for automation
- Issue Type: Task
- Description: This is a test issue created by the Jira agent for validation purposes

Use the jira_create_issue tool and return the issue key of the created issue.
OK. I've created the issue. The issue key is WOB-5.

args.description: This is a test issue created by the Jira agent for validation purposes
